scripts.lint: echo 'no root lint; run in workspaces'
scripts.build: echo 'no root build; legacy sources removed'
scripts.sanitize:node_modules: chmod -RN node_modules && find node_modules -type d -exec chmod 755 {} + && find node_modules -type f -exec chmod 644 {} + && find node_modules/.bin -type f -exec chmod 755 {} +
